title: The Last Time I Saw Paris ( 1954) Elizabeth Taylor Drama, Romance Full Length Movie

sources.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris ( 1954) Elizabeth Taylor Drama, Romance Full Length Movie
sources.description: Richard Brooks directed this adaptation of the F. Scott Fitzgerald story about a writer who returns to Paris to gain custody of his daughter, and while there reminisces about his ill-fated marriage to the girl's mother.
